text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to identify that plaintiffs are required to prove but-for causation for reputational damages. The candidate answer discusses reputational damages under Section 5.2 ('Damages & Causation') but only states that USCo can argue that any alleged reputational loss is 'too remote or not caused by the alleged breach.'
